main event: A single round, white object was observed to move toward the East and then return.
interesting points: The object was observed at dusk near the vicinity of LaGuardia and Idlewild airports.
The observer used binoculars to view the object.
The report states the sighting was very scant.
Due to the location and course of the object, it was evaluated as a probable aircraft landing at one of the nearby airports.
location: vicinity of LaGuardia AP, New York
